contents.text: Welcome to C3, the Peninsula’s leading provider of enterprise AI, predictive analytics, and IoT software solutions.
To learn about our AI, predictive analytics, and IoT solutions, and to schedule a demo, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative about solution deployment, please hold the line.
Thank you for choosing C3. A sales specialist will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Discuss enterprise AI & IoT solution deployment options and pricing with a sales specialist
Discuss deploying an AI-driven analytics platform to improve veterans’ benefit program management
Connect me with a sales engineer to discuss deploying your enterprise AI predictive analytics and IoT stack at my organization.
I need to speak with someone about deploying your AI and analytics solutions at my business.
I’d like to speak with a sales rep to discuss using C3’s predictive analytics for my physics research and schedule a demo.

contents.text: To arrange a personalized product demonstration, please hold the line.
We’re connecting you to schedule your product demo. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized demonstration of the predictive analytics platform
Schedule a personalized demo of the C3 predictive analytics dashboard for my veteran support nonprofit
I’d like to schedule a deep-dive demo of your analytics platform, focusing on real-time data ingestion and visualization features.
I want to schedule a personalized demo of your AI, predictive analytics, and IoT software.
I want to arrange a tailored demo of your IoT platform for monitoring my lab sensors.

contents.text: For technical support, customer service, or troubleshooting assistance, press 2.
For assistance with your existing C3 platform account, please hold the line.
Our customer support team is gathering your account details. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Update billing and contact information on my existing C3 platform account
Get assistance accessing my existing C3 account and review my subscription details
I need assistance updating my C3 platform user credentials and regenerating my API access keys.
I need help accessing my C3 account because I can’t log in.
I need assistance accessing my existing C3 account to retrieve my stored simulation data.

contents.text: For troubleshooting and technical support on our AI and IoT applications, please hold the line.
A technical specialist will be with you momentarily. Thank you for your patience.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot connectivity issues between my IoT devices and the analytics application
Troubleshoot an issue with IoT sensor integration on the C3 platform for monitoring facility conditions
I’m experiencing errors deploying my IoT edge device with your AI module and need help debugging the connector pipeline.
My IoT devices linked to C3 aren’t working and I need troubleshooting assistance.
I’m having errors with the C3 AI/IoT application in my experiment and need technical support.
